question: 8 (b)
statement_html: Use the first three terms of the series found in part (a) to find a numerical estimate for the constant e (the base of the natural logarithms).
statement_latex:
Use the \textbf{first three terms} of the series found in
{part
(a)} to find a numerical estimate for the constant \emph{e} (the base of
the natural logarithms).
statement_raw: Use the '''first three terms''' of the series found in [[Science:Math_Exam_Resources/Courses/MATH103/April_2005/Question_08_(a)|part (a)]] to find a numerical estimate for the constant ''e'' (the base of the natural logarithms).
